content.detailedDescription: Following  car. 120 miles.An. hr  7  miles. have. oil. painting. of. ufo
content.summary: Have. oil. painting  followed. car 120 mph to. home bi

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were married in may 1982. my sister came to visit the next september and was staying next door at our parents house. she was visiting my wife and i and had coffee and brownies . she said she was going to moms to get ready for bed around 11:00pm . i walked with her . we stopped and sat in my moms yard , her in a pourch swing and me in a lawn chair while we talked. we were there only a few min. when i looked up. straight up for some reason. i saw what looked like a white moon way up in the sky. then instantly it grew in jumps . maybe only 3 jumps in size and it was treetop high . about the size of a football field. it did this in less than a second. the bottom seemed completly flat and now yellow. i stood up and ws looking at the size of this thing and backed over my lawn chair knocking it over.. the bottom began swirling around looking like molten metal redish yellowish orange with white looking like molten metal and it began humming in a pulse like hum. i was standing looking straight up at this thing looking it over for size and height when it starts to hum. the bottom was blinding bright . the next thing i know i blink and its no longer straight up. but my sister is standing right in front of me now looking straight up at an empty sky like i was. shes only about 4-6 inches from my face. i look around for the object quickly and i see the outer edge of it sliding over my parents roof out of sight. i noticed it was bright white now and the tall gum trees had most of their leafs hd fallen off because of the season . but a few at the very top were still on the tree and as this thing slid over the treetops, not making any noises now.., the leaf remained dead still. when it went out of sight i ran arount the house to see it again but it was gone. no lights moving anywhere. i looked at the sky. it was a crystal clear sky the stars looked almost round like a 3-d night. i was walking back around the house looking at the sky waiting for something to move when i came up to my sister half way back. she ask me if i saw it and i told her no. i told her it was gone. we walked back to the pouch swing and both sat it the swing this time. we just sat starring at the sky for a few minutes looking for any stars to move or something to move. my sister said i'll never tell anyone about this . and i agreed. then she said she was real tired and was going in and going to bed. i said me too. and we went in, her in my moms and me at my home. now when we first left my house my wife was going to clean the kitchen and was dishes and pick up the house . both the tv and the radio were playing and all the lights were on in my house.This was , i thought 15 or 20 min. ago. when i walked in all my lights were out the tv and radio was off. the kitchen cleaned and my wife was asleep deep. i was so tired i crawled across my wife and passed out. my wife said she waited up for me till around 3:00am. i dont know what took so long that night and im kind of affraid to find out.I didn't remember this for 6 years. my sister and brother inlaw were visiting and i remembered while we were sitting at the table talking. i said youll never believe this but..I began telling what i saw and my sister said i remember too. i was there too. my brother inlaw had been sterile since he was a teen ager and he and his first wife tried to have kids for three years and the doctors told him he was sterile but my sister had his fist son in june 1983 , nine months later then another one less than a year after that. his first son was covered with staph over his body while my sister didnt have it. im very bad with dates. my sister, while we were with our husbands and wives, helped piece together our memeries for that night. to this point any way.
content.summary: Sitting with my sister outside looked straight up and seen a moon like object which desended instantly to treetop height and hovered while it began humming and changing colors blinked and it was moving across the roof out of sight  went to my house 4 hour

content.detailedDescription: Was taking my dog outside after work, noticed a very bright light in the north sky, immediately knew it was not a plane or satellite. was to low and bright for a satellite and had no blinking lights for a plane, no noise and was flying over billings logan international airport so would of had to have some kind of directional lights or beacons. i ran inside and grabbed my phone and went back outside and that's when it turned to the west but wasn't really a turn but more of a long arch turn is the best way to describe it. i started to film it and zoomed in as far as i could, i moved my phone down twice to show the street light as a marker for how high and fast it was traveling. the second time i zoomed down on the street light the object dimmed  but was in the same spot traveling at the same speed but within 5 seconds it sped up so fast the light completely  vanished and the first thought that went through my head was that it didn't seem to follow the curve of earth but seemed like it just went straight into space, the objects size did not change when the light dimmed just was not as intense and when it sped away it didn't just dissappear but could see it vanish as it got so far away in under 1-2 seconds at most. i tried to contact the airport to see if any tower control saw anything or if they had radar but could not get an answer.
content.summary: Bright white light moving south then west dimmed light sped off incredibly fast

content.detailedDescription: I was a trucker,loaded in nogales,az.At 2:39p their time for houston,tx.,while taking a short cut down hwy-82 no more than 45mins after loading i became real sleepy so i pull over in a little pull out and lay my head down.The next thing i remember was i was on the side of the road on hwy-90 west of san antonio, tx. it was 10:pm. i do not know how i went 950 miles in 6 1/2 hours. this was in 1980, my bills were time stamp an and with other paperwork. my mother lives in satx and i call her to meet me at the coffee shop, she laughed at me till i show her my bills with the time stamp. this is when the speed limit was 55mph.I never took hwy 90, always went i-10. after years of  this and having people laugh about it, it  bother me now.  i do remember being inside,and they are not little grays.
content.summary: Right there.

content.detailedDescription: I was outside taking my parents dog out when i noticed a star like entity bright and twinkling rapidly, so i went and got my binoculars. as i looked into my binoculars i noticed the lights were changing all different colors from blue green red white and pinkish. i also stood in several different areas and heights to get different views and it stayed the same. no sound was emitting. i did notice it was slowly moving and at times appeared to look like 2 lights and a boomerang then back to being one object with a smaller to the side of it. i've seen this before but tonight weirded me out! it was the first time i got to see it with binoculars on hand *score* and seeing it so prominently. i've seen this randomly over the years, i'm an avid sky watcher during the day and night. it was not a plane i saw a few during this sighting so i had a good reference to the size of this object. also this is not the only ufo i've seen in florida.
content.summary: I was out side when a shimmering star like entity caught my eye. it was changing so many colors i had to get out my binoculars. when i looked i could see it looked almost like 2 separate lights changing from 5 different colors.

content.detailedDescription: I had just gotten off work and returned home and took my dogs out for their walk at about 2200 hrs. we left the house and walked s/b to the corner which is about 700 ft. we do this walk every night the same way. we are close to travis air base and there is a small local airport less than a mile away. there was a full moon and slight cloud cover. i see all kinds of planes and this was nothing like that. i am a retired police officer and i am trainded to observe. as i stood on the corner facing east i saw a slow moving orb traveling north from my right. it was pulsating blue which is a color hardly ever seen. it appeared to be between 300 to 500 ft in the air and traveling at about 75 mph. i would guess that it was about 10 feet in diameter and made no sound what so ever. i thought that someone may be playing with drone but at it got up near me it turned away and headed east. i watched it climb and travel beyond what a drone could do. it changed directions darting to the right then to the left as it disappeared into the cloud cover. the pulsating round blue light never changed shape, speed or brightness, it was very consistant. i thought it was strange because there were no other aircraft in the sky and usually i see several military aircraft during our walk or even small planes from the local airport. i told my family about my sighting and desided to report it in case someone else also observed it. it figures it was the only night i didnt have my cell phone with me to photograph it.
content.summary: Observed blue pulsating orb traveling n/b then turned e/b and zig/zag as it gained altitude.

content.detailedDescription: Ok me and my cousins was outside looking at a red star in space a white line reappeared,then we could see a disk shape object ,i said too the space ship to lite up it did.It got over my house and i asked again they did ,after the lite went back out we could still see it until we couldn't see it no more .We are not alone i've been seeing them seeing u do,s spence a little boy.
content.summary: We was looking at a red star a object came in our apmispher,i asked them to lite up for me and they did it for me two times i asked them and i have witnesses.

content.detailedDescription: It was about 2:00 am when i decided to go outside for a smoke break, after working on the computer for six hours. i stretched and looked straight up and saw two fast moving pearl-like spheres at the zenith, heading in fast formation to the south. they had an interior blue-white tone with no fuzz, sound or trail. they were moving so fast i decided to count down the observation time. they vanished over the south horizon in about eight seconds. i estimated they were at 40,000 to 50,000 feet altitude, and moving in excess of approximately 20,000 mph or more. they appeared to be about as big as a small aspirin held at arms length. they were about a finger width apart and in tight formation. they were so clear, it startled me. the speed was unnerving.
content.summary: Observed two pearl-like spheres moving from north to south at incredible speed

content.detailedDescription:
This occurred in savannah, georgia, about 1959 or 1960. i was maybe 11 or 12 at the time, living on the second floor of an old victorian house on west broad street, with my mother and older brother. i recall there were only three television stations in town, and they usually signed off around 11:30. there was no school the next day. i don’t recall if it was because of a weekend or a holiday. my mother and brother had already turned in. but i was wide awake hoping for a late movie. no such luck. the last station signed off for the night and i was left with no alternative but to go to bed. i slept in a small room off from the main bedroom.
as i was getting undressed i heard a faint whirring sound outside (that’s the best way i can describe it). i flicked off the light and looked out the window toward the park/playground across the street. in the distance i saw a light just above the tree line, how far away i couldn’t really tell. it rose and proceeded in my direction. by this time it had my full attention. 
it came close enough for me to make it out as a craft of some kind. under the bright moonlight i could see its shape and the sheen reflecting from its smooth silver surface, which appeared to be stainless steel or aluminum. it appeared to have a saucer shape. from my perspective to the side, it was like a flattened football. there were bluish-green lights dotted along its rim, like the windows of an airliner. at least that part was not spinning, as the sound suggested. the pitch of the sound rose and fell as it moved, indicating speed. i remember being more captivated than frightened.
at that age i was into military aircraft and i could tell you pretty much what kind of aircraft were being used by our armed forces, and most other nations. this was not one of ours (i mean terrestrial). we had nothing (and still don’t to my knowledge) that looked like, sounded like, or could maneuver like this craft. it was difficult to tell the size because i had no way of judging the distance. the impression i got was that it might have been roughly the size of a boeing 707, or a c-130 hercules (military cargo plane). 
at its closest point, it stopped dead still and hovered for a few minutes, somewhere between 500 and 1,000 feet up. other than the low whirring sound, there was no noise of engines, propellers or rotors beating the air. then, it abruptly shot straight up and in a matter of seconds it was nothing but a moving dot of light, before it was completely out of sight. i knew for a certainty that this was no natural phenomenon. it was a physical, mechanical object under intelligent control. i have heard some of the debunkers claim that such sightings could be attributed to ball lightning, swamp gas or other natural occurrences. but this was none of that. the image is nearly as clear in my mind today as it was then. what i saw and heard was not something you are likely to forget. 
in my excitement, at school that week i mentioned it to a couple of friends. they listened, and neither actually came out and called me a liar. but i can still remember the doubtful looks on their faces. it occurred to me at that point that this might be something better kept to myself. 
this sighting is likely the reason i am an avid science-fiction fan today. i don’t have to imagine if someone else might be out there. i’ve seen the proof. although, i did wonder what the occupants must have been like. unfortunately, i had not yet taken up photography, so there are no pictures. it might have helped if i had awakened my brother or my mother to witness it. but that didn’t occur to me until later, when i was lying awake trying to get to sleep. 
at the age of 68 i am no longer concerned about who might consider me a crackpot. and from what i have read, there are other folks at mufon who have had similar experiences. one thing i need to mention is that i was not one of those preadolescents who didn’t know the difference between fact and fantasy. i knew there was no santa clause or easter bunny. my brother and i were usually with my mother when she bought our christmas presents. i used to watch superman, but i knew no one could actually fly without some assistance. when i saw what i saw i was neither sleepy nor deluded. a real, though unidentified, craft had appeared in the night sky above savannah, ga. if anyone else witnessed it – i suppose i will never know.
content.summary: A whirring sound caught my attention and i looked out the window to see a light moving slowly above the treeline. it came close enough for me to make out a saucer-shaped craft with bluish-green lights. after hovering, it shot straight up and disappeared.

content.detailedDescription:
I stepped out of my house to smoke and caught a white flash out of the edge of my eye almost above my trailer so i looked up and i saw a white glowing object, it was very high but not as high as commercial airliners fly, i could not tell a shape but it was as big as a commercial airliner or bigger. it was moving north about the speed as a airliner but there were no flashing lights just a white glow, it flew north for a couple minutes across the valley then when it was over the north rim of our valley it did a u turn not a 90* but too sharp of a turn for an airplane.
then it excellerated and flew south east and flew from one side of the valley to the other aprox. 35 to 50 miles in three seconds and was out of site. it appeared as fast as a falling star as it flashed across the sky.
i don't know what it was but i have seen military jets fly across our valley and know this was no conventional jet, it had no flashing lights and i have never seen something go any where near as fast as this thing flew from one side of our valley to the other.
i would estimate it was above 10000 feet maybe higher when i saw it right above my home, but it only flashed white one time that is what drew my attention. i see commercial airliners all the time and know their speed and flashing lights...
it was very exciting cause i know it was not an airplane of any type, what it was i don't know.
content.summary: Saw a glowing objet go across the sky at first slow then u turn and zip across the valley very fast

content.detailedDescription: On august 5th 2015 i was looking out of my window when i observed what i thought was a bright star. it suddenly shot straight up in the sky with an extremely long tail behind it. i went outside with my girlfriend into my back yard and she proceeded to point in the tree where my dog is saying there was a light that looked like it was through it on the other side, which i then saw too. we saw it again and then heard a strange noise that sounded unlike anything either of us had ever heard before. kind of like a cackle. we approached the area where my dog is and she came out of the doghouse and sat down,when suddenly she let out a yelp and we saw two bright orange light-like things by her side as she ran quickly in the other direction. we immediately ran back to the house because it was dark and we became terrified. i wanted another witness so we got a flashlight and woke my little brother up and went back outside again after trying to explain what we observed. as we walked back out through the yard and got close to the field, and a green-white light literally flew from behind us and went directly over my brothers head about ten feet above, and went into the tree where my dog is tied up. we were freaked out but we stayed to try and determine what exactly what was happening. i shined my flashlight out across through our neighbors back yard and we saw what appeared to be a small child out in the darkness that then ran behind a tree and hid. i turned off my light and suddenly we saw the same bright orange light-like things but there were several of them, some higher than others but all close to the ground in the brush and trees. they were like fiery eyes in pitch blackness without any lights to make a reflection it was very scary! we kept seeing child like shadows walking back and forth in the shadows of the trees and i know sometimes your eyes can play tricks on you but this was a very serious situation and three of us witnessed the same thing. suddenly there was a crashing sound like someone running out of the brush towards us and my brother ran away and at the same time my girlfriend and i saw the same green-white light fly up and over another tree from that general direction and it swooped up then down and then went back upwards in a circular spiral direction before disappearing again. we decided it was time to go and when we started walking away we could hear what sounded like bear feet on the ground running so we hurried up and suddenly saw a child-like thing run along the edge of the cornfield very quickly and it freaked us out in the worst way! we ran down and closed the gate and at which point we heard the cackle sound in several different spots from where we were looking and it sounded like the communication of some otherworldly things then suddenly we heard a pulsating sound that was like something out of a scary movie and so we went to go back around front of the house and then there was a horrid suckling sound in the field out front and as we walked towards it we saw the same green-white light over our heads flying towards the sound before disappearing. it was literally about fifteen feet above us and we decided we had enough so we ran in the house. when i went back into my room i looked out the window where i initially saw the bright white light with a tail fly straight up, and i observed the bright fiery orange light-like things up by the edge of the field there were two of them and then they were gone. there's more to all of this but i wont add every single detail for the sake of lengthy novel. none of us slept that night because we were so scared and baffled by what we saw. i know this sounds like bullcrap, but out here in the country where we live there are some erie happenings taking place that would make you sound like a fool trying to explain to someone. we haven't spoken about the incident but i've been constantly thinking about it and so i started looking on the internet, and i found this site. even with this detailed description, i still feel uneasy and you'd literally have to see what the three of us saw in order to understand... needless to say, we do not go outside in the dark around here anymore. someone please shed some light on this strangeness, i'd love to hear a logical explanation for it.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Saw several strange things starting by an observation from my window that led me outside

content.detailedDescription:
Okay here we go, first off this incident i am reporting is not my first time seeing objects in the sky, i have had abduction memories coming back from 20 years ago and have been visited many times.  my friends are scared to hangout with me because at night i will say "they are up there", then we go outside and sure enough they see what i see in the sky.

i have been having intense connections mentally with the lights in the skies for about 7 years now.
i would love for it to be documented correctly with video tape and important individuals who can make it known but don't know where to begin so i decided to come here for help.

last viewing, right now today, 8/10/2015.
outside having a smoke, time 1:26am est.
looked up for the lights, they were there.
counted, had to stop count because there was too many.
mostly the lights will hover then do quick sharp 90 degree turns but constantly stay in the same general area.

i am still currently watching the objects and i feel that they know i'm writing this because they want their presence known.

the objects will stay up there 3-4 hours or until i get sleepy and go to bed but its every night!!!

i have grown to accept them and meditate with positive energy towards the situation.
i can feel them when they are around or wanting to "show off" their skills.
i have shown many people who literally get up and run away and never want to have contact with me because i have scared them so badly, ex: i told my friend once "watch this" and spoke towards a light, "turn off your light now!", it immediately turned off.  then i spoke again in the same general area 2 minutes later and said, "turn your light back on", within half a second it was back on then flew across the entire sky in under 10 seconds.

i have many many many examples, literally probably 1000 encounters and would love to meet/talk to somebody who would be interested in fully documenting my experiences because they are extremely powerful.

o and fruit for thought, i have lots of relatives in high up classified programs as well my father has over 40 patents for inventions that people use everyday, so if an ebe was interested in our progress as humans, i might be a good candidate to study....Just saying that's my theory to why i'm targeted.

thank you for reading,
jake buschur
702-808-5179
content.summary: Many orbs "dancing" in the sky!!

content.detailedDescription: Walked outside..Seen bright light flying very fast in a southeastern direction..Thought it was a plane...No blinking lights, no sound....Flying way too fast and too bright for plane...Changes direction! light became dimer and dimer...Within seconds looked like headed out of atmosphere..Second observation in a year...This one was brighter....First witnessed by three people...In 6 months.  we live by cold lake where planes fly by frequently...Not a plane
content.summary: Bright lifgr flighing southeast...Then stright out to space

content.detailedDescription: I was having a cigarette outside, and like i usually do, i look up at the sky. i proceeded to look down on the ground, then i looked back up to the sky, and there was a bright white light hovering, quite large.. it moved a tiny little bit.. i did not take my eyes off of it whatsoever as i was intrigued. the object literally vanished before my eyes.
content.summary: Ufo

content.detailedDescription:
1. driving home to hanford ca. from salinas ca. direction of travel east on hwy 198. watching 2 very bright lights over small mountain range to my right/south of my location. at approximately 1115pm on a tues. 
2. lights were very bright. hovering over small mountain range approximately 100 feet above mountain range, approximately 3/4 to 1 mile away. lights to be 100 ft appart. no blinking or strobe action like aircraft lights.
3. thought they were work lights for a cell tower or  similar.
4. i slowed to 25 mph to have more time to observe lights. lights then appeared to move. approximate speed was 25 mph heading east parallel to me. lights continued east. 1 light appeared to pass the other then take lead. lights continued following mountain range traveling in a north east direction towards me in a intercept course. lights disappeared behind tall trees approximately less than 1/4 a mile away traveling north. i believed the lights would cross directly over my vehicle. i turned off radio and ventilation. rolled down both windows. lights flew over vehicle at low treetop level. appeared to float. no sound or rotor wash. lights glowed no light cast or projected. 1 red light. 3 white lights in a triangle pattern around red light. all lights appeared to be in similar size as traffic lights. lights appeared attached flush to bottom of craft(s). no shape or silhouette observed. only observed overhead for few seconds.
5. curiosity for what it was. joked to self my car will die like "close encounters".
6. lost sight due to steep embankment to my left/north. craft was still traveling north at 25 mph at last sighting.
content.summary: 2 sets of lights, possible 2 crafts, pass overhead of me at low altitude and speed at night.

content.detailedDescription: Lying beside my wife and near a campfire, flat on a blanket with feet facing toward lake which would be west and looking up into the stars on the beach on platte bay. just enjoying the perfect summer night and in awe of all the stars we could see. had head turned to my right which means i had a view of the northern night sky over lake michigan. when a craft moving at a rate of speed that is unimaginable or definitely unobtainable with human technology caught my attention. this thing was in space way above earths atmosphere maybe satellite altitude give or take a few thousand miles or maybe a little less altitude than that. it reminded me of the way a water spider moved. these little bugs seem to propel themselves in little jerking motions instead of one continuous smooth movement. this thing moved extremely fast but not in a continuous smooth way. it covered my whole view of space above lake michigan form north to south in less than a minute. but i think it was using some type of technology to propel itself that exploded, because space lit up around it and then it would jerk or shoot itself further along its path. it reminded me of what i call sheet lighting or i think some call it heat lighting. but this happened very fast, each time it would jerk forward space would light up all around it for what must of been for a thousand miles way out there and i mean this thing was out there somewhere. so in just a few really fast jerks for lack of better terminology and lighting up space around it in it's region of space it moved in i guess i would say what must of been enormous segments of space. i turned my head lying there to follow it from right to left or north to south. i called out to my wife and she saw it when it was probably even to where we were at or directly west of us. so she saw only half of what i saw. when it got way over to my left or to the south it seemed to kinda of swerve or dodge really quickly at maybe a 45 degree angle into deep space i guess, and it was gone from sight. it seemed to go along a squiggly path at a short 45 degree angle up to my left or south maybe south-west and was gone out of sight. i say a short 45 degree, i mean a short segment of space compared to all that it had just traveled. i mean it was immediately obvious to me i was seeing a display of intelligent technology way beyond anything of this earth. i guess after watching some of stuff about mufon on tv, i figured why not mention what we saw that summer night. i mean that's a few seconds of my life i will never forget as long as i live. i know this was no meteor or satellite. i know i witnessed another type of intelligence of some kind that night. a technology that dwarfs our so much that i think we must still be in the cave man age compared to whatever or whoever was driving that thing. i don't think a human could even begin to even think of surviving the kind of g-forces that might of been generated by that type of space travel. well have a good one and happy investigating.
content.summary: Clear night could see every star for miles in all directions over lk. mi, craft was in space traveling from n, to s, generally & then seemed to swerve or dodge & headed into deep space.

content.detailedDescription:
I was traveling east on fm 3005 when i couldn't help but notice this large craft hovering over the beach shoreline with a lot of spectators with families on the beach.

i pulled into the parking lot entrance not driving too close as the size of the ufo was hugh! plus not being a familiar with this big force of a craft i was scared to venture where the other cars were directly under this craft.

i had my sunroof open and decided to take a quick video with my iphone and proceeded to drive east towards town after a few minutes.

traffic was bad so i turned around, and headed back home as i was shook-up from what i saw. i had to drive by the site and was hoping to view from the road. the craft was no longer there and was heading east towards town.

i proceeded to drive home to download and view the craft on my laptop.
much to my surprise what i saw with my eyes and on video were much different. the ufo from viewing with my eye looked like it was hovering at a stationary view. on the video the craft is moving so fast in various directions you have to place the video on slow and pause to view the craft.

it was an amazing event i will never forget. i am reporting this event as there were many people who witnessed this on saturday august 8th, 2015 and i'm hoping someone else may come forth with the same location of craft to document.
content.summary: Triangular boxed craft hugh with beautiful colored lights under craft to view

content.detailedDescription: I was attending a rooftop party with my girlfriend and her friends when i decided to take a photo of the view. i saw the capital building where congress works so i snapped a photo with my camera phone and posted it to facebook not really thinking anything of it. i checked my notices and saw that a friend noticed the 6 to 8 lights in formation over or just beyond the capital building. he said in my post "ufos". i was confused and looked at the picture up close and saw what i had taken a picture of. i was shocked and amazed. yes, there were airplanes around but not flying overhead. dc has restricted airspace. could have been military aircraft but i doubt that. just looking off into the distance in the direction of the capital building i didn't notice the lights at all. perhaps the city lights drowned them out. but from the looks of it the orbs of light are pretty big. the image was not altered in any kind of way.
content.summary: I took a picture with my camera phone of the capital building in dc not really expecting to capture a photo of ufos.

content.detailedDescription: My nephew and i were listening to the radio in his car after pulling up to his mothers house. we got out the car and he looked up and asked me whats that in the sky? i am prior military so i looked up and immediately i knew it was nothing ive ever seen. i pull out my phone and started recording. at first it was one orb but then there were more. they were orange red orbs one after another flying towards us right over us and turning sharp changing direction. they made no noise and were pulsating. they were too low to be a plane and had no other identifiable markings, no wings or anything. there were over 12 people watching this. i was concerned but more excites. one was a prior army pilot,one a navy weapons specialist, n myself prior air force. none of us with over 30 combined years of military experience could explain what they were except that what flew over our heads was not of this world.I called the police to confirm that nothing was going on in the area and they said nothing was going on or reported. that same night i received word these orbs were seen in washington d.C. only a few minutes later but i cannot confirm that. there has been increasing number of sightings in my area.I was afraid that my video was going to get confiscated so i uploaded it online. if you want the link please contact me. a few people have seen my video and confirmed that what i recorded they have seen several times for years with no explanation and one that admitted he was afraid to say something because of fear of being ridiculed.
content.summary: Orange obs flying towards me, silently but fast observed by over a dozen people including army navy and airforce people

content.detailedDescription:
I was outside on my porch with a friend talking when i looked up in the sky and saw over 100 individual fireball ufo's gliding slowly in a military formation style. i knew they were ufo's the first time i layed eyes on them. i never seen this many on any ufo video i've seen in the daylight or in the evening. my friend was in a state of shock and ran inside but came back and recorded what you see on the video. i ran in to get my binoculars and looked at them as i have seen stars in the form of nothing but a light with no formation. the time it took each of us to run in the house was quick and these ufo's were gliding at a slow pace. 

i have 4 recordings of these ufo's but in the other recordings, they came from a different direction and at a faster pace in the formation of 2's. this recording happened on may 26, 2012 and the other 3 recordings  happened on may 26, 2015 at the same location on my porch as i came home but recorded this with my cell phone. 

if you cannot see the first video i uploaded it on youtube under the title "unidentified flying objects in the city." all these objects disappeared in the night sky.
content.summary: This was recorded about 2-3 minutes later than video taped so there were over 100 unidentified flying objects and we captered the tail end.

content.detailedDescription:
I just walked outside an ice cream store off the intersection of 32nd avenue 22nd street south in south fargo nd. too a bight of ice cream than casually looked up into the southern night sky. i saw at first what appeared to be two bright close stars. both appeared stationary for about 3 seconds as i first was observing the "stars". then the "star" on the object started moving very slowly in a straight line away from the other star at and upward and slightly more to the sw sky. at first i thought it was a airplane at cruising altitude, but on closer observation there were know signature green/red blinking lights, and no observed jest sound, which i always here for planes that high on calm nights like this one. i though of the possibility of it being a satellite, but that would not make sense because it was stationary for a good 2-3 seconds in respect to the other bright start to its right. the interesting thing is the object slowly got dimmer and dimmer until it vanished as it traveled along its straight path. i considered the possibly of it being a shooting star, but this was not a good description because it moved way slower than a shooting star, and it did not have a characteristic flash/emission/glow as a shooting star, plus the object/star was stationary for a good 2-3 seconds when i first saw it. i have seen many shooting stars before, and trust me, this was not one. thus i failed to identify what it was, not a star, plane, shooting star, nor a satellite, most likely was not a weather balloon either. at the time of the sighting, it was a gorgeous calm clear sky summer evening. there was a plane in the southern  direction on the horizon on mid-approach from the south into hector international airport at the time of the my sighting. 
total length of observation of the star like object was 8-10 seconds from first seeing it stationary to it disappearing as it "faded out"

also i was driving by the airport this afternoon and saw an f-15 or f-18 grey jet fighter at the jet center, which was a very unusual thing to see for how many times i been around there.
content.summary: Looked up into the sky after walking outside on 32nd avenue 22st south (approx). in fargo nd and i saw a star like light/object slowly move in a straight line upwards getting dimmer in the sw sky. it appeared to be a star at first.

content.detailedDescription: First time was a light first seen by my friend.  we where looking through the scope of his rifle at the city from a mountain top using it like binoculars.  he noticed a light come up out of the trees and hover just above them on a neighboring mountain top.  he told me to look at it and pointed it out.  about that time a airliner flew over and the light went back down into the trees.  after the plain left the light went back up and started moving towards us.  we where looking at it through the rifle scope taking turns and i can only say it looked like a bright light with a tail.  we got in my truck and started to speed down the logging road away from it but it just followed us at tree top level keeping pace with us.  we stopped and my idiot friend shot at it and at that time it just took off at an angle fading out looking like a star and eventually disapearing. it only took it about 2 seconds to fade out like a star and disappear. to much to say about the other times but they where just as strange.  i have never been more scared in my life.  my friend and i don't talk anymore because of it.  it bothered him that much.  please contact me by phone.  as there is more of this kind of thing on t.V. i am finally wanting to talk about the 4 times this happened to me over 3 years.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: More than one event.  happened 4 times over 3 years.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving just before sunrise on way to work in rural area. i turned corner at rural intersection and it was hovering about 10-12' above highway. i turned on bright lights and it moved off highway over cornfield and disappeared. the best description i can give is a diamond shape with longest point on the horizontal plane. the movement wasn't exactly linear. it almost appeared to "swim" as it moved.  it had a burnt orange glow and the surface almost appeared to be in a liquid state. i drive this road 6 days a week. there is nothing along this stretch except fields. no lights, no signs, nothing to reflect light, no other traffic. also no lightning, or wind. i have decent eyesight, no medical conditions. i was maybe 150-175' from it when i saw it. it still makes my hair stand on end to talk about it.
content.summary: Was hovering 10' above road and took off across field

content.detailedDescription: As we were driving home at night, through the countryside from dryden to groton ny, a very large glowing red light was above the treetops. we decided to go in its direction. we couldnt believe its size. turned onto another road to get closer to it. it got closer/larger. we drove closer & it began to pulsate and move. we sat silent, opened windows & heard nothing. we watched as it changed brightness enough to notice. neither the huge light or our car moved..Like it knew we were watching it. it began to get smaller as if to asend up but it began to move to our left/ne then back to us..We drove a little bit and then it came back towards us. scared, we stopped the car and watched. it got larger again and then pulsate more. then it shot straight up then off to the east/south & disappeared completely. we were so alarmed & had so much adrenaline that we forgot to take our phones out. we came home and told our families. we didn't know who to tell. tonight i was watching history channel explaining how we can report sightings. i'm so happy to be able to share my experience with the right people.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Large bright pulsating red light that moved close to my car changed direction & shot off into the night

content.detailedDescription: Following  car. 120 miles.An. hr  7  miles. have. oil. painting. of. ufo
content.summary: Have. oil. painting  followed. car 120 mph to. home bi

content.detailedDescription:
I went out on the front step for a smoke and something caught my eye in the sky, it was a bright dot like the light of a plane in the distance.  i got really bright and change shape from a light to a shape, it was almost like it was back-lite it was now oval metal shape.  the bright light changed back to a star-light shape and flew straight for about 2 - 3 seconds and disappeared.  i thought it was plane at first but when it light-up like someone was shinning a light on it and the size increase greatly, it wasn't a plane!

wow, i don't know what it was but i know it wasn't a plane
content.summary: Seen a light in sky then it got really bright and looked oval shaped it dimmed to starlike and flew right four 3 sec and disappeared

content.detailedDescription:
Hello,

this picture was sent to me, taken in jersey on thursday 8/6/15, not only is there a ghost captured on this photo, behind the dear, you see three greys looking straight to the person taking the photo. the greys were not visible when this picture was taken.  

please look closely behind the dear
content.summary: 3 greys whom were invisible the the human eye

content.detailedDescription: neighbor alerted us to come check it out.We observed a dark object that was very high in the sky. it looked like a traditional "satellite" shape and appeared as if it were just floating in space and slightly rotating.The object was dark in color and had ocassional white/orange lights almost like engines firing up. then in no pattern small lights began to appear one at a time around the main dark object.. about 4 directly next to and down to the right. these other lights were similar to fire flies in nature as the lights were random but were still centered around the larger dark object. and then about 3 more randomly to the left. the object "floated" with no noticeable noise to the southeast.. we watched until it was out of sight. all witnesses reported eye floaters while viewing which seemed to make us question what we were seeing. the sun was low in the sky but it was not dark yet.. about 7:30-8pm.
content.summary: object was very high but almost looked like a traditional "satellite" shape and appeared as if it were just floating in space and slightly rotating.  object was dark in color and ocassional white/orange light almost like engines would show.

content.detailedDescription: Outside looking in sky and saw these 3 orbs rotating around each other and forming a straight line.  then back again. a plane flew over top of it at one point. it moved very slowly.  observed by myself and 2 other people. tried to focus on it with binoculars, but it disappeared before i was able to. not able to get a photo because it was too high to see with my phone.It was definitely not a plane.  made no noise.
content.summary: Outside looking in sky and saw these 3 orbs rotating

content.detailedDescription:
August 8th 2015 around 11:25 pm in old bethpage long island i saw what appeared to be an orange fireball or jet aircraft on fire. the fireball flickered like flames but had no smoke or smoke trail. i really thought it was an aircraft on fire and was waiting to see if it plummeted to the ground, even though there were no strobe lights or navigational lights. the fireball flew about the speed of a jet around 5000 feet high from the east to the west over several minutes in a clear evening sky until it finally disappeared in the west behind a cloud. 
it had the appearance and color of fire, it was not a chinese lantern and it was not a meteor. their was no trailing debri or smoke, nothing falling from it, and the orange glow lit up the cloud it disappeared into.
content.summary: Fireball flew in straight path across the sky for several minutes about the speed of a jet
